item.title: Wuthering Waves: All Unfinished Book Challenges (Freehand Circle Achievement Guide)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Unfinished Book Challenges Locations and Puzzle Shape

The Rinascita region in Wuthering Waves introduces a variety of challenges, including several new puzzle types featured in the Three Fratellis Brother challenges . Among these, the Unfinished Book puzzles stand out as one of the few repeatable challenges, offering players the opportunity to earn the Freehand Circle achievement under the Footprints in Rinascita 2 category.

There are a total of 12 Unfinished Book challenges scattered throughout the Rinascita region . Completing all of them is essential for advancing exploration progress and unlocking the achievement. While obtaining 75% of the pages is sufficient to earn the chest reward from Fratellino, achieving the Freehand Circle trophy requires players to complete each challenge with at least 95% accuracy . Here's all players need to know to help them achieve high score, as well as to find them easier.

How to Get Freehand Circle Trophy Easily During Unfinished Book Challenges

With no time constraints on completing the trail, players should take their time and proceed at a comfortable pace. Once players return to the third-person view after starting the challenge, the trail will remain illuminated for a short time, serving as a helpful guide to stay on track. It's also important to keep an eye out for faint sparkles that indicate the locations of the lost pages as players progress along the path.

Paying close attention to the general shape of the image is also beneficial, as many of them form recognizable shapes, such as a heart or a boat, which can make remembering the layout easier. Additionally, players should pay attention to the details within the arena, such, books or piles of paper, flowers, and even the arena itself, since these can act as visual markers to assist with precise navigation, especially to decide where to make turns.

Lastly, for those who find memorization difficult, taking a screenshot of the bird's-eye view trail before starting can provide a handy reference, eliminating the need to rely solely on memory - or simply refer to the shape guides below.

All Unfinished Book Challenges Locations and Puzzle Shape

Here are the locations and short guides for each one of the puzzles, in order to help players reach 95% easier with certain visual cues.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #1 - Whisperwind Haven (Egla Town)

The first puzzle is located in the center of Egla Town . Players should observe the water jet locations closely, as these can serve as directional cues for the entire path, allowing them to navigate and follow the path by turning at the appropriate points.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #2 - Whisperwind Haven (Silver Moon Grove)

The second puzzle is located in the Silver Moon Grove area of Whisperwind Haven . To reach it, players simply need to head west from the teleport point. The trail for this puzzle is heart-shaped, and players should focus on forming the heart pattern around the pile of pages. Be sure to include a small loop at the top center of the heart to capture the pages in that section. This puzzle is relatively easy to complete with a high score, as long as players also pay close attention to the end part of the trail. Once the heart is completed, get to the end spot with a bit of a curve.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #3 - Nimbus Sanctum

The third puzzle is located north of the Lorelei Boss in the Atrium of Reflections. While the shape may appear complex, players should focus on moving quickly at the start of the trail and making sharp, precise turns during the zig-zag sections. As the trail transitions into a straighter segment, carefully follow it around the pile of papers, and just go straight with a bit of a curve. Finally, pass behind the Unfinished Book pedestal and continue to the designated endpoint to complete the challenge.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #4 - Penitent's End (South)

The fourth challenge is located in Penitent’s End, east of the southest teleport point. The trail resembles interconnected triangles, requiring players to focus on making precise turns and following a straight line. Pay close attention to key landmarks, such as the mushroom with books and the Unfinished Book pedestal, as these serve as helpful indicators for where to make sharp turns. Between these points, aim to move as straight as possible to maintain accuracy and follow the trail easily.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #5 - Thessaleo Falls

The fifth puzzle is located west of Twin Peaks Bridge and can be easily accessed by Fast Traveling to the Forgery Challenge and heading north. For this challenge, players will need to create the shape of a four-pointed star. Use the three pages as key reference points, aiming to circle around them while creating inward curves between each point to form the star shape as accurately as possible. Pay close attention to the transitions to ensure the trail appears as "star-like" as intended.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #6 - Averardo’s Vault (Garden of The Lost)

The sixth puzzle is located southeast of the Garden of the Lost in Averardo's Vault, requiring players to trace a butterfly or fairy-like shape. The primary visual cues for this puzzle include the scattered pages on the ground and the Unfinished Book pedestal. Due to its complex shape, this challenge can be particularly difficult for players who struggle with making sharp turns at the corners, as it demands a high level of precision.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #7 - Averardo’s Vault (Resonance Nexus)

At the halfway mark, the seventh puzzle is located east of Resonance Nexus and features a shape resembling a bell or hourglass. This challenge is among the easiest to complete, thanks to the abundance of visual cues, such as small candles and scattered pages, which make it straightforward for players to follow the trail accurately.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #8 - Penitent's End (The Strand)

The eighth puzzle is also located in Penitent's End, this time near The Strand area. The trail takes the shape of a boat, which serves as a helpful visual cue but requires players to follow a relatively straight path with precise, sharp turns. The most critical cues are the scattered books, which players should closely turn around to maintain the correct shape. Otherwise, they may veer off track and create an entirely different line. If unsure whether they're still on the correct path during the straight sections, players can pause and check the glow of the lost pages to realign themselves. Overall, this puzzle can be challenging to achieve a 95% accuracy score.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #9 - Fagaceae Peninsula (Oakland Highcourt)

The ninth puzzle is located in Fagaceae Peninsula, on the north side of Oakland Highcourt, and just south west of the nearby resonance beacon. The shape of the trail resembles two leaves of a blossom. Players should focus on the three scattered page spots along the path. The two pages on the sides will serve as turning points for each leaf, while the middle page is the one players need to pass through multiple times to complete the trail.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #10 - Fagaceae Peninsula (North of Oakland Highcourt)

The tenth puzzle is located further north from the previous one, near both resonance beacons. In this challenge, players need to follow a trail shaped like a swan. The scattered pages once again serve as the key visual cues. This puzzle is one of the easier ones to complete, as the turns are not very sharp, and most of the shape can be completed before the glowing trail timer runs out.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #11 - Fagaceae Peninsula (Shores of the Last Breath)

The eleventh puzzle is best accessed from the nearby Flying Echo challenge Fast Travel point, located to the west of Shores of the Last Breath. The shape here resembles an hourglass. Although it may seem like there are no obvious visual cues, it's actually one of the simplest puzzles to memorize due to its symmetrical design. Players can use the arena's floor lines as a guide; by following the north and south lines, they can reach the middle area where the lines cross near the pile of pages. This makes the puzzle relatively straightforward to complete.

Unfinished Book Puzzle #12 - Hallowed Reach

The final and twelfth puzzle is located near the Hallowed Reach Resonance Nexus. This trail is shaped like a diamond and is relatively easy to complete. The most notable visual cue for this puzzle is the blue flowers scattered on the floor. Players can simply follow the path outlined by these flowers to complete the diamond shape effortlessly.

item.title: Captain Blood Finally Has a Release Date After Nearly 20 Years
item.description:
Summary

  • Captain Blood finally gets a release date after getting lost at sea for 20 years.
  • The hack-and-slash action-adventure is confirmed for May 6, 2025, coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, Steam, GOG, Epic Games Store, and Mac.
  • The upcoming game promises high-octane combat and flashy combos in a graphic novel style.

The long-awaited Captain Blood action-adventure game from developers Seawolf Studio and General Arcade with publisher SNEG has finally been given a release date. The upcoming title is a revived Xbox 360 game based on the novels by Italian writer Rafael Sabatini about the adventures of the titular captain. Set on the Spanish Main during the 17th century, players will step into the pirate’s boots for a wild escapade through the buccaneer lifestyle, and the development team has promised a lot of blood to live up to the captain’s name.

The Captain Blood revival passed through several ideas during the 2000s before getting lost at sea in 2010 after its last showcase. Another game that endured a notable road to launch was STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl , as the FPS survival horror team combated war, cyberattacks, and a devastating fire that thwarted the game’s initial 2012 release. Thankfully, the sequel to 2009’s Call of Pripyat was finally released in November 2024 to great success.

Revealed in a 51-second trailer, Captain Blood was confirmed to be released on May 6, 2025, coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, Steam, GOG, Epic Games Store, and Mac. Captain Blood certainly has the reputation to join video games' most dangerous pirates, rubbing shoulders with the likes of Far Cry 3 ’s Vaas Montenegro and Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag ’s Edward Kenway, as the titular protagonist navigates the sea in search of gold and reputation. Focusing on hack-and-slash combat, players can expect to tackle enemy hordes equipped with “flashy” combos.

Captain Blood Receives May 2025 Release Date

  • May 6, 2025

Securing a May release date, Captain Blood has now made the most anticipated 2025 games list, alongside Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 , The First Berserker: Khazan , and Assassin's Creed Shadows . Gamers quickly responded positively to the reveal, noting the graphics and action looked “incredible,” and the call for more Xbox 360-era games to be revived followed. Praise was also given for the 2024 demo, where players reported strong connections to the characters but asked for more combos to be included in the full release.

Ubisoft’s Skull and Bones sounded like it would be the pirate title of gamers’ dreams, and Captain Blood may step in to save the day, potentially reaching the heights of the best hack-and-slash games of all time. Swashbucklers can expect to indulge in high-octane, pirate-themed shenanigans, and intense ship deck combat using an arsenal of on-brand weapons, all polished with a graphic novel art style increasing its originality.

item.title: Echoes of the Plum Grove - Nintendo Switch Release Date Trailer
item.description: Take a look at the official Nintendo Switch release date trailer for Echoes of the Plum Grove, a cozy farming simulator developed by Unwound Games.

item.title: Genshin Impact 5.4 Livestream Redeem Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Genshin Impact 5.4 Livestream Redeem Codes (January 2025)
  • How To Redeem Genshin Impact Codes
  • Primogems In Genshin Impact

Primogem is the primary resource Genshin Impact players would need to get new characters and weapons. The easiest way to get this currency is obviously by spending money to buy Genesis Crystals and convert them into Primogems, but the most affordable way is by being active, following every in-game event, and, of course, hunting additional Primogems from web events or codes.

Some redemption codes are released at a fixed interval. For instance, three livestream codes are always announced every six weeks, and new redeem codes are available at the start of every version. If players are wondering which Genshin Impact redeem codes are currently available, they can refer to this article.

Genshin Impact 5.4 Livestream Redeem Codes (January 2025)

Exchange the following Genshin 5.4 livestream codes to get 300 Primogems:

  • GISPECIALPROGRAM54 - 100 Primogems & 10 Mystic Enhancement Ores
  • MIZUKI0212MIZUKI - 100 Primogems & 5 Hero's Wits
  • AISABATHHOUSE - 100 Primogems & 50,000 Mora

Additionally, here are all the Genshin codes for January 2025:

  • HNYM49IX9PDS - 60 Primogems
  • GENSHINGIFT - 50 Primogems & 3 Hero's Wit

Expired Codes

Unfortunately, due to them being time-limited, the following codes are no longer available.

  • ACUI8BJ5333E - 10k Mora, 10 Adventurer's Experience, 5 Fine Enhancement Ore, 3 Seasoned Fang
  • SDKLSK67TZ1X - 10k Mora, 10 Adventurer's Experience, 5 Fine Enhancement Ore, 3 Seasoned Fang
  • FORNATLAN - 40 Primogems
  • KAM7UKZGVRXZ
  • MAVUIKAWISHES - 30 Primogems, 1 Hymn of Gathered Flame
  • WAM5UWWU28NV - 60 Primogems & 5 Adventurer's Experience

How To Redeem Genshin Impact Codes

There are several ways players can redeem Genshin Impact codes:

  1. Visit the official website https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/gift
  2. Use the redeem codes button from the in-game setting

Method 1

For the first method, visit the official website, then do the following:

  1. Log in to the HoYoverse account that matches the target Genshin account
  2. Select the appropriate server that contains a profile
  3. Paste the code in the Redemption code box, or simply press on the provided link, and this box will be filled automatically
  4. Press redeem

Method 2

For the second method, open Genshin Impact , and once it loads, follow these steps:

  1. Go to Paimon’s menu
  2. Press Settings
  3. Go to Account
  4. Choose Redeem Code
  5. Input the available Genshin Impact redeem code
  6. Press Exchange

Primogems In Genshin Impact

Primogems can be used for several things, but players commonly spend it on wishing banners to get the characters or weapons that they want. Other than this, the currency can also be used to recharge Original Resin or buy Battle Pass level . Each Battle Pass level costs 150 Primogems, and will stay at this rate even if players buy 50 levels at once. Meanwhile, Original Resin recharge gets more expensive over time and is capped at six times per day.

Daily Refill Primogem Cost
1 50
2-3 100
4 150
5-6 200

Each refill will grant 60 Resin, so in total, players can get 360 Resin at the cost of 800 Primogems.

To get Primogems in Genshin Impact , the most reliable and affordable source is the Daily Commission and Welkin subscription. However, other sources like Spiral Abyss, Genesis Crystals, Battle Pass, Events, Adventure Rank rewards, achievements, and HoYoLAB check-in are also available.

item.title: How to Find All Circuit Locations in Toilet Tower Defense
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Toilet Tower Defense Circuit Locations
  • 1 Circuit Location
  • 2 Circuit Location
  • 3 Circuit Location
  • 4 Circuit Location
  • 5 Circuit Location
  • 6 Circuit Location
  • 7 Circuit Location
  • 8 Circuit Location
  • 9 Circuit Location

Toilet Tower Defense has many different modes and challenges. In addition, the developers add events with valuable rewards. For example, the Tech Event requires players to search for several items. Therefore, in this guide, we will tell you how to find all the Circuit locations in Toilet Tower Defense .

At various points on the map in this Roblox experience, players can find Circuits, by collecting which they will receive quite valuable rewards. In addition, picking up these items will boost the number of Batteries you receive.

All Toilet Tower Defense Circuit Locations

The Tech Event is quite simple in Toilet Tower Defense , as all you have to do to complete it is complete event missions. They will reward you with Batteries, which you can spend in the event shop on various useful items. But while most of the missions are pretty trivial, like killing a certain number of enemies or surviving a wave, one is quite unusual. To be more precise, you need to find 9 Circuits scattered around Toilet Tower Defense .

Completing this mission will reward you with 500 Batteries and 1,000 XP. Moreover, with each Circuit obtained, players will receive 10% more Batteries in this Roblox game. And even though they are hidden quite well, you can find all Circuit locations in Toilet Tower Defense pretty quickly by following our tips.

1 Circuit Location

The first Circuit location is in the Apocalypse City area. Find the Ranked board to the right of the teleporter on the map. The desired item is hidden behind it.

2 Circuit Location

Next, you'll want to visit the Toilet Fortress area. You'll want to climb the rock behind the portal to the map to find the second Circuit location in Toilet Tower Defense .

3 Circuit Location

Start the battle on the Tech City map. There's a Circuit behind the rock in the corner.

4 Circuit Location

Visiting the Tech City map will easily reveal the Circuit in the center.

5 Circuit Location

The fifth Circuit is also on the Tech City map. You'll just need to look behind the enemy portal to find it.

6 Circuit Location

This Circuit is challenging to find, as it's hard to spot even if you know where to look. Players should check the crates at the Unit Index Portal, which is to the left of the Summon Unit building.

7 Circuit Location

Teleport to the Trading Plaza location and check behind the torii gate that's opposite the Marketplace.

8 Circuit Location

Check the pond on the left side of the Trading Plaza location to find the eighth Circuit in Toilet Tower Defense .

9 Circuit Location

Visit the right pond in the Trading Plaza location and climb the twisted wooden obelisk to get to the last Circuit.
